Title: Technomarine Technomillenium Diamond Chronograph
ConditionDescription: Used ladies watch in good cosmetic and working condition
Description: Technomarine diamond Chronograph. Stainless steel case 200m WR, screwdown crown, sapphire crystal. Swiss ETA quartz movement Mother of pearl dial with steel stick hands. Black diamond markers White and black diamond unidirectional bezel. Not worn often, so the watch and original Alligator strap are in excellent condiiton Complete with spare green silcone Technomarine strap and screwdriver. Presented in its suede covered inner box with cardboard outer box. No papers. This outer box has an issue in that the laminate has lifted/bubbled, as can be seen in the pictures.
